Date: 2025-03-10 16:49
Subject: NDA - Marsh Insurance
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Tarek,

 

There are some small revisions to the NDA based on what the broker is required to share, as is necessary, while working as an agent to source for quotes and proposal from insurers.

 

This is for a groupwide cover but the policy will be issued under MCT FZE or Real FZE. Is there anything that needs to be mentioned that this extends to other Chalhoub companies?

 

Appreciate if you can let me know your thoughts on the above and for the changes requested in the attached form.

 

Thank you for your kind support.

Best Regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​
